It handles temporary files carefully, manages subprocess timeouts, and supports multiple output formats. It checks for Tesseract version compatibility and includes robust error handling. The only potential concern is the execution of external processes with user-supplied parameters, but these are controlled within the scope of the script and related to OCR tasks.
